Package org.expressme.webwind.container

IoC container interface and build-in implementations of WebWind.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ContainerFactory Factory instance for creating IoC container.
 

Class Summary
GuiceContainerFactory Create Guice 2.0 Injector instance, and bind it on ServletContext with name of Injector.class.getName().
SpringContainerFactory Wrapper for Spring 2.x.
 

Package org.expressme.webwind.container Description

IoC container interface and build-in implementations of WebWind. It provides Guice and Spring support by default.
